lead_paragraph: GOLDENHAR--Paulette, born June 23, 1927, died February 28, 2016. Widow of her beloved Maurice, loving mother of Francine, Didi (and son-in-law William Kornblum) and adoring grandmother of Lucas Schlager. Paulette was a hidden child of WWII, saved by the courage of Fernand Esnault and family in Chenois, Belgium. A lifelong Belgian citizen, she taught English and the ways of America to newcomers at the International Center in New York. Paulette was passionate, compassionate, intuitive, witty, and a splendid raconteuse. She lived her motto: "La vie est courte et il faut se hater d'en jouir." In lieu of flowers, please contribute to the Weiner Family Palliative Care Unit at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York City. 1/3
